page.title: 07SCHOOL IN CARMARTHEN 1985
page.content: The Model School is in Catherine Street,Carmarthen. It is a Church School,and was built over 100 years ago.It has six classrooms,three in the juniors,and three in the infants.One of the classrooms is for handicapped children.There are six teachers and two students,who come from the college. School starts at 9:00am,and closes at 3:45pm.In the morning a pupil reads a prayer out of a book. You can either have school dinners,which are sixty pence a day, or you can have sandwiches Afternoon lessons start at 1.30.There is another break at 2.45 until 3pm.Our main subjects are Mathematics,English,Welsh,History, Science,Art,and Music.
